item.title: Don’t believe reasoning models’ Chains of Thought, says Anthropic
item.description: New research from Anthropic found that reasoning models willfully omit where it got some information.

item.title: Beyond generic benchmarks: How Yourbench lets enterprises evaluate AI models against actual data
item.description: Hugging Face warned that Yourbench is compute intensive but this might be a price enterprises are willing to pay to evaluate models on their data.
